verses.name: Matthew 8:17
verses.text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying, Himself took our infirmities, and bare our sicknesses.

verses.name: Matthew 8:18
verses.text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him, he gave commandment to depart unto the other side.

verses.name: Matthew 8:19
verses.text: And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.

verses.name: Matthew 8:20
verses.text: And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
